name: Notion Monk Mode Planner
description: Supercharge your life with Monk ModeA 1-Week Monk Mode planning template for Notion designed to help you reflect, track and plan your life in a digital all-in-one system.What's included? One-page printable Monk Mode planner Non-negotiable goals & habits Weekly tasks & goals section Weekly time boxing planner Easy to use, customize & set up ↑ Upgrade to Monk Mode OS ↑ The upgraded Monk Mode OS is your all-in-one automated Monk Mode Operating System to help you crush your 31-day Monk M
features: One-page printable Monk Mode planner; Non-negotiable goals & habits; Weekly tasks & goals section; Weekly time boxing planner; Easy to use, customize & set up; Who is Monk Mode Planner for?This template is for anyone looking to for a digital planner to systemize and organize their Monk Mode.; How do I learn Notion?You can become a Notion expert with my new course,The Notion Bible. This will teach you everything you need to go from beginner to expert in no-time.; Do I need to be on a paid Notion plan to use this template?Not at all. You can use all the features of this template without a paid Notion plan.; What happens after I purchase?After your purchase, you will be redirected to a Notion page containing the template. From here, you can duplicate the template into your own workspace in 1 click.
